translation.en: We are going to burn it down.
-You are dismissed. -[soldier] Yes, sir. Thank you.
[Two-I-C] All of you, pack your weapons. Be ready to move.

translation.en: [Commandant] Ah-ha! Make sure this thing is burned.
[Two-I-C] Don't make me be waiting for you, soldiers!
We are leaving nothing for them to find.
[Commandant] We are supplied and moving. Over.
translation.it: Siamo carichi e in viaggio. Passo.

translation.en: Make sure all the guns are clean.
translation.it: Controllate che le armi siano pulite.

translation.en: [Commandant] They have been buried for a long time.

translation.it: - Speriamo funzionino. - Rubate rifornimenti, fino alla vittoria.

translation.en: This will keep the spirit up, despite the UN embargo.
[Goodblood] Our fight is a just one.
translation.it: La nostra è una lotta giusta.

translation.en: Being a freedom fighter is discipline, obedience and loyalty.
translation.it: Combattere per la libertà comporta disciplina, obbedienza e lealtà.

translation.en: We remain ever loyal to Supreme HQ, sir.
translation.it: Saremo sempre fedeli al quartier generale Supremo, signore.

translation.en: Standing by for future orders. Over.
[Goodblood] Keep moving. Keep fighting. Over and out.
translation.it: Non fermatevi. Continuate a combattere. Passo e chiudo.

translation.en: This here. This is the route where we are now.
Listen. From here, we must go down.
And wait by that road there.
translation.it: E aspettare vicino a quella strada.

translation.en: Because I think something is coming across there.
Hey! Why? Where do you go? Come over! Fuck! Fly!
translation.it: Ehi! Dove vai? Vieni qui. Cazzo, sbrigati.

translation.en: [CO Hope] Preacher, give me the ganja.
[CO Hope] Agu, you know, ambush rule number one, no noise.
translation.it: Agu, regola numero uno nelle imboscate: non fare rumore.

translation.en: You keep quiet. Keep very quiet.
If even a snake bite your legs, you keep quiet.
translation.it: Neanche se un serpente ti morde una gamba.

translation.en: You get hit, you keep quiet.
What is the rule number one in ambush?
translation.it: Qual è la prima regola delle imboscate?

translation.en: No talking, even if snake is biting you.
translation.it: Stare zitti, anche se ti morde un serpente.

translation.en: You talk, enemies come around, we all go die.
translation.it: Se parli, i nemici ci scoprono e siamo morti.

translation.en: They are coming. Everybody, be quiet. They are coming.
[soldier] Hey, you! Go! Cut them off!
Search this vehicle. Search all the vehicles.
I want this victory mapped. Map them. Map this victory.
translation.it: Voglio quantificare la vittoria. Avanti, perquisiteli.

translation.en: This vehicle, all the bodies, I want them pockets searched.
translation.it: Perquisite l'auto, i cadaveri. Frugategli nelle tasche.

translation.en: All of it! Search them good-good.
Go and bring me my charge.
-Sir! I find this. -Why don't you open it?
Agu, you are going to kill this man.
[man stammers] Please. I'm supposed to be fixing the bridges.
translation.it: La prego. Dovevo riparare il ponte.

translation.en: You are going to kill him today.
[man] I not be a soldier. Please, sir.
I'm an engineering student from the university in the capital.
translation.it: Sono uno studente di ingegneria. Studio all'università della capitale.

translation.en: I'm supposed to be fixing the bridges,
Pass me something for this guy.
-Nah, that's too big. -It will be cutlass.
Does he have strength for this?
Yeah, he is strong. You can do it. Preacher, put him on his ass.
translation.it: Sì, è forte. Puoi farcela. Predicatore, mettilo seduto.

translation.en: -[man sobbing] -Put him on his ass! On his ass! Agu, come.
So when you are chopping wood, lift up high-high. Up, high.
translation.it: Come quando tagli la legna. Alza bene la lama.

translation.en: Then when you are ready, you come down so well-well into the flesh.
translation.it: Poi, quando sei pronto, colpisci forte affondando bene nella carne.

translation.en: -You have chopped melon before? Melon? -Please, no.
translation.it: - Hai mai tagliato un melone? - Per favore.

translation.en: -Well, this is not a melon. -Please, no.
translation.it: - Questo non è un melone. - Vi prego.

translation.en: I said shut your mouth, huh? Shut your mouth.
translation.it: Ti ho detto di stare zitto.

translation.en: You are making it hard. This is hard.
translation.it: Ci complichi la vita. La testa è dura.

translation.en: It's hard, so you must split him good.
translation.it: È dura, quindi devi spaccarla con forza.

translation.en: Huh? Agu, these are the ones that killed your father.
translation.it: Agu, loro hanno ucciso tuo padre.

translation.en: [Commandant] These are the ones, the dogs that kill your father.
translation.it: Sono gli animali che hanno ucciso tuo padre.

translation.en: [Commandant] Agu, these are the ones that killed your father!
translation.it: Agu, sono loro che hanno ucciso tuo padre.

translation.en: That is what you call justice. Hmm.
[Agu] God... I have killed a man.

translation.it: È il più brutto dei peccati.

translation.en: it is the right thing to be doing.
translation.it: che è la cosa giusta da fare.

translation.en: This will be the Commandant's car.
Take this fucker out. He is filthy.
translation.it: Tira fuori questo stronzo. Fa schifo.

translation.en: Give this to my charge. Huh?
-This will be the Commandant's car. -Yes, sir.
translation.it: - Questa sarà l'auto del Comandante. - Sissignore.

translation.en: [Two-I-C] If you are losing it, then I am losing you.
-You are driving? -[Two-I-C] Okay to move out.
Everyone, get ready to move out.
You got this stuff from where?
Hey, I'm asking you a question, and you are not talking.
translation.it: Ti faccio le domande, ma tu non rispondi mai.

translation.en: I am thinking about my mom...
translation.it: Io penso sempre alla mia mamma,

translation.en: I am asking a question. You are not talking.
[boy 1] Where is he? [boy 2] Keep going, keep going.
[boy 3] Grass cutter! Grass cutter! Grass cutter!
[Commandant] And you're having any food that you want,
translation.it: Potete mangiare tutto il cibo che volete:

translation.en: from chicken, cow, fruit and vegetable...
Any kind of fish that you want, we got. The fisherman is bringing it from the sea.
translation.it: Abbiamo tutti i tipi di pesce. Il pescatore li porta dal mare.

translation.en: There's nothing you cannot have there.
translation.it: Potete scegliere quello che vi pare.

translation.en: And the best thing of this place, this town of abundant resources,
translation.it: Ma la cosa migliore di quel posto, la "città delle risorse abbondanti",

translation.en: Hey, the women are too beautiful there! Too beautiful.
Ah! The next thing you know, your soldier will be standing to attention.
translation.it: Senza neanche accorgervene, vi ritrovate col soldato sull'attenti.

translation.en: They are having bottoms with specifications so nice
translation.it: Hanno un sedere così ben fatto

translation.en: that the ground where they're sitting down is also rejoicing.
translation.it: che persino la terra su cui si siedono ne trae beneficio.

translation.en: And they know... they know how to be treating a man.
translation.it: E sanno come trattare un uomo.

translation.en: How to make him feel good, kisses and all that, huh?
translation.it: Sanno come farlo stare bene, con i baci e tutto il resto.

translation.en: Last time I was there, my soldier was hurting.
translation.it: L'ultima volta, il mio soldatino mi faceva male.

translation.en: But you will see because you are going there yourselves.
translation.it: Ma lo vedrete voi stessi, perché ci andrete.

translation.en: You will see with your own eyes, gentlemen.
translation.it: Lo vedrete con i vostri occhi.

translation.en: -Who is this? -Refugees from the village, sir.
translation.it: - Questi chi sono? - Profughi del villaggio, signore.

translation.en: They said the PLF and the NRC took their village three days ago.
translation.it: Dicono che il PLF e l'NRC hanno invaso il villaggio tre giorni fa.

translation.en: They killed most of the town, but they let these ones go.
translation.it: Hanno ucciso quasi tutti, si sono salvati solo loro.

translation.en: Well, let us be giving their village back, huh?

translation.it: - Two-I-C! - In ascolto. Forte e chiaro.

translation.en: Uh, we are facing heavy fire, sir. Over.
It's very difficult, sir. Men are fighting bravely,
translation.it: Non credo, signore. Ci stiamo difendendo bene,

translation.en: but I don't know if we can hold too much longer. Over.
translation.it: ma non so quanto resisteremo. Passo.

translation.en: [Commandant] Press on! [Two-I-C] Roger. We need support, sir.
Some of our men are injured.
The men's spirits are low. Sir, do you copy?
translation.it: Il morale è basso. Mi sente, signore?

translation.en: Copy, sir. We will reapply pressure and push for the bridge. Over.
translation.it: Ricevuto. Aumenteremo la pressione e cercheremo di arrivare al ponte. Passo.
- È la vostra missione! Mortaio. - Sissignore!

translation.en: See this thing, huh? This is a very special device.
translation.it: Vedete questo affare? È uno strumento speciale.

translation.en: We can be seeing the enemy even when the enemy is hiding.
translation.it: Serve a vedere il nemico anche quando si nasconde.

translation.en: Ah! There you go. See our guys. Look, we are taking them.
translation.it: Vedi i nostri uomini. Stiamo attaccando.

translation.en: We want to take that bridge.
Now we are going to take that bridge.
[Commandant] That bridge, we are taking it!
[Commandant] Better look me in the eyes, motherfucker.
-Are you ready to fight? -[all] Yes, sir!
-Are you ready to fight? -[all] Yes, sir!
-You want to take that bridge? -[all] Yes, sir!
-We're gonna take that fucking bridge? -[all] Yes, sir!

translation.it: - Non c'è ritirata! - Non ci arrendiamo!
- Non c'è ritirata! - Non ci arrendiamo!

translation.en: -[shouting in English] No retreat! -[all yelling] No surrender!
translation.it: - Non c'è ritirata! - Non ci arrendiamo!

translation.en: [Preacher] Our Father, from dust we were created. We shall go back to dust.
translation.it: Padre Nostro, polvere eravamo e polvere torneremo.

translation.en: [Two-I-C] I commit my fellow soldiers into your hands.
translation.it: Affido i miei compagni alle Tue mani.

translation.en: May their soul rest in peace. Amen.
[Agu] I am now knowing the smell of the dead.

translation.it: È dolce come lo zucchero di canna
e marcio come il vino di palma.

translation.en: And when they stay in the sun, they are growing plump like brown mangoes.
translation.it: E se restano al sole, diventano grossi come la mangusta bruna.

translation.en: [Goodblood on radio] You have your next mission. Stand by.
[Goodblood] Capture the central regions, capital city, Bov.
translation.it: Conquistate subito la zona centrale intorno alla capitale, Bov.

translation.en: I will promulgate an order making you Brigadier General.
translation.it: darò ordine di promuoverla Brigadiere Generale.

translation.en: You'll be a general before we finally seize the capital city.
translation.it: Quando conquisteremo la capitale, sarà già un generale.

translation.en: [Commandant] Yes, sir. It is a challenge, sir.
But I promise you, it's mission possible. Over.
translation.it: Ma le assicuro che riusciremo nell'intento. Passo.

translation.en: [Goodblood] Well, then, next time I see you, I'll be speaking to a general.
translation.it: La prossima volta che ci vedremo, avrò davanti a me un generale.

translation.en: And how is your Two-I-C performing? Over.
translation.it: Come se la sta cavando Two-I-C? Passo.

translation.en: Two-I-C? Sorry, sir. What do you mean "Two-I-C"?
translation.it: Two-I-C? Mi scusi, signore. Non capisco.

translation.en: [Goodblood] I've always rated that young man.
Well, Two-I-C is a formidable soldier.
translation.it: Two-I-C è un soldato formidabile, signore.

translation.en: [Goodblood] Teach him the ways of a good commander.
translation.it: - Gli insegni a fare il comandante.
- Gli insegni a fare il comandante. - Sissignore.

translation.en: [Goodblood] Now, take Bov. Keep that spirit up, and bring us closer to victory.
translation.it: Ora conquisti Bov. Tenga alto il morale e ci porti più vicino alla vittoria.

translation.en: [Goodblood] You want to be a general, don't you, Commandant?
translation.it: Vuole diventare generale o no, Comandante?
- Sissignore. - Allora se lo guadagni. Passo e chiudo.

translation.en: -Agu, you fought well today. -Thank you, sir.
translation.it: - Agu, sei stato bravo oggi. - Grazie, signore.

translation.en: Agu, you are wanting to be knowing how to be leading?
-I am happy to be following you, sir.
translation.it: - Sono felice di seguire lei, signore.

translation.en: -I am happy to be following you, sir. -That is good,
translation.it: - Sono felice di seguire lei, signore. - Bene.

translation.en: because there is no learning how to be leading.
translation.it: Perché comandare non è una cosa che si impara.

translation.en: Some people are born to be leaders, others are born to be followers,
translation.it: C'è chi nasce per guidare, chi nasce per seguire

translation.en: and others are just waiting to be dying.
translation.it: e chi sa solo aspettare la morte.
- Io sono bravo a seguire, signore.

translation.en: -I'm a good follower, sir. -Agu, you are different.
translation.it: - Io sono bravo a seguire, signore. - Agu, tu sei speciale.

translation.en: You are reminding me of when I was a small boy.
translation.it: Mi ricordi com'ero io da piccolo.

translation.en: That is how I know you are going to be a leader.
translation.it: Ecco perché so che diventerai un leader.

translation.en: You see, even the best leader
sometimes he must be knowing how to be a follower.
I am following the Supreme Commandant, even if I am not agreeing.
translation.it: Io seguo il Comandante Supremo, anche quando non sono d'accordo.

translation.en: Yes, sir. I'm a good follower.
translation.it: Sì, signore. Io sono bravo a seguire.

translation.en: The Commandant is saying we must take this.
translation.it: Il Comandante Supremo dice che dobbiamo conquistare questo posto.

translation.en: So, hmm, if it is important to him, it is important to me.
translation.it: Se è importante per lui, è importante anche per me.

translation.en: Because if we get that, then we can go to Taro.
translation.it: Se conquistiamo quel posto, possiamo arrivare a Taro.

translation.en: -That is where your mother is, eh?
translation.it: - È lì che si trova tua madre, vero?

translation.en: -That is where your mother is, eh? -She is in the capital.
translation.it: - È lì che si trova tua madre, vero? - Vive nella capitale.

translation.en: After we've been greeted by Dada Goodblood,
we'll be taking the capital certainly.
You see, I've been wanting to help you more than the others, Agu,
translation.it: Vedi, voglio aiutarti più di quanto non aiuti gli altri ragazzi,

translation.en: but you cannot be telling the others how I'm helping you like this.
translation.it: ma non puoi riferire a nessuno di questo aiuto.

translation.en: It'll have to be our secret.
-You are knowing how to keep secret?
-You are knowing how to keep secret? -Yes, sir.
translation.it: - Sai tenere i segreti? - Sì, signore.

translation.en: -Well, be saying it. -I can be keeping this secret, sir.
translation.it: - Allora dillo. - Saprò tenere questo segreto, signore.

translation.en: I'm not punishing you, Agu. Mmm?
But I do care for you.
translation.it: Lo faccio perché tengo a te.

translation.en: Be doing this thing... for me.
-[chickens clucking] -[boy 1] They are jumping like rabbits.
-Go, go. Keep going. -[boy 1] Go. Keep going.
I don't want that I call you and you just stand there. Agu?
translation.it: Non devi stare impalato, quando ti chiamo. Agu?

translation.en: Come here, I'll give you some brown-brown.
It'll cure everything for you, eh.
Hey, I didn't call you to stand there.
translation.it: Non ti ho chiamato perché tu stessi fermo lì.

translation.en: My boy, what is wrong with you? What is wrong with you?
Come here, I'll give you some morale booster.
translation.it: Tieni, questa ti tirerà su il morale.

translation.en: I think I'll give you that brown-brown, so...
Morale booster, you know. Come, come. Here.
translation.it: Per tirare su il morale. Vieni. Ecco.

translation.en: [Commandant] Nobody is your friend where we are going.
translation.it: Dove andremo non ci saranno amici.

translation.en: They are the farmers that have fed the enemy.
translation.it: Quei contadini danno da mangiare al nemico.

translation.en: -The farmers' wives whose breasts... -[Preacher] Agu. Agu. ...have been feeding babies.
translation.it: E le mogli dei contadini allattano i bambini del nemico.

translation.en: [Commandant] That is the nature of the land that we are going.
translation.it: Ecco com'è la terra in cui andremo.

translation.en: Our people's blood has been flowing for years.
translation.it: Il sangue della nostra gente scorre da anni.

translation.en: That's why it is time for their blood to flow.
translation.it: È giunto il momento di fare scorrere il loro.

translation.en: because they are all enemy, all of them!
He is guiding us with what we are about to be doing.
translation.it: Lui ci guida nella nostra missione.

translation.en: God, we will be sacrificing our blood!
That is why we must spare nobody!
translation.it: Ecco perché non dobbiamo risparmiare nessuno!

translation.en: Because we are invincible. We are invincible!

translation.it: - Chi siamo noi? - Chi siamo noi? - L'NDF, signore!

translation.en: [Commandant shouting in English] NDF, spare nobody!
Come on, move, NDF! Move, move! Move!
[soldier] How the Commandant look? [all] All right, sir!
translation.it: - A chi rispondete? - Al Comandante, signore!

translation.en: -I say, how the Commandant look? -[all] All right, sir!

translation.it: - Chi siamo noi? - Chi siamo noi? - L'NDF, signore!

translation.en: Leave this one under my charge.
I will be training him to be a warrior.
[CO Hope in English] Move, move! Move, move, move! Move!
-[Preacher] Fuck you! Fucker! Fucker! -[Preacher] Fuck you! Fucker! Fucker! -[people screaming]
-[Agu] Fuck, fuck, fuck! -[Agu] Fuck, fuck, fuck! -[gun firing]
-Out, out. Over here. -[woman and little girl screaming] Fucking out! Fucking out! Out!
Fucking out! Out! Get up! Get up, fuck! Get up! Up!
[CO Hope speaking English] What the fuck going on here?
[speaking native language] I was looking for you!
[CO Hope speaking English] Where do you know this woman from? You know her?
translation.it: Perché conosci quella donna? La conosci?

translation.en: [speaking native language] I was looking for you!
[speaking native language] You're not my mother!
You're not my mother! You fooled me!
translation.it: Non sei mia madre! Mi hai ingannato!

translation.en: [Agu in English] God... are you watching what we are doing?
translation.it: Dio, ci stai guardando? Stai guardando quello che facciamo?

translation.en: You didn't fucking boy, eh? You didn't fucking, boy.
translation.it: Non stavi scopando. Non stavi scopando, ragazzo.

translation.en: Fuck him up, eh? Fuck you up. Fuck you up.
[soldier] Commandant, sir. This is for you, sir.
translation.it: Comandante, è arrivato questo per lei.

translation.en: [Two-I-C] From the Supreme Commander. What does it say?
translation.it: Dal Comandante Supremo. Cosa c'è scritto?

translation.en: Now it is your turn to eat.
-Are we going to Taro? -Are we going to Taro? -[explosion]
What is happening to this one?
A piece of RPG is hitting his temple.
translation.it: È stato colpito alla tempia da una scheggia.

translation.en: [woman] I beg you, please, don't shoot me! Please!
-[soldier] Hey, keep your eyes down! -[soldier] Hey, keep your eyes down! -[Commandant] Oi! Oi! Oi!
[Two-I-C] What do we do with the civilians?
translation.it: Che ne facciamo dei civili? CONSIGLIO NAZIONALE DI RIFORMA TOCCA A NOI MANGIARE

translation.en: Send him up north to the next village and then the next village after that.
translation.it: e mandatelo al prossimo villaggio a nord. Poi al successivo.

translation.en: Tell them that we are coming. It's only the beginning.
translation.it: Dirà loro che stiamo arrivando. Questo è solo l'inizio.

translation.en: Take note and act accordingly. Strika and Agu are now part of my squad.
translation.it: Prendi nota e agisci di conseguenza. Voglio Strika e Agu nella mia squadra.

translation.en: [soldier] We are proceeding to Taro with arms. Over!
translation.it: Avanziamo verso Taro. Siamo armati. Passo!

translation.en: What kind of welcome is this?
translation.it: Che razza di accoglienza è questa?

translation.en: Sorry, sir. You, get in that car. Take them to HQ.
translation.it: Scusi, signore. Voi, scortateli al quartier generale.

translation.en: Right this way. Right this way.
Weapons are not allowed in here. So you place them here.
translation.it: Le armi non sono ammesse qui. Lasciatele fuori.

translation.en: You wait here. Here. Have a seat.
And you will bring us water?
Goodblood says this is a token of appreciation--
translation.it: Un regalo di Goodblood in segno di apprezzamento...

translation.en: I'm sorry. The Supreme Commander is so very upset to keep you waiting.
translation.it: Mi scusi. Il Comandante Supremo è molto dispiaciuto per l'attesa.

translation.en: -What is this? -He'll be with you shortly.
I would like you to know we also offered rations and water
translation.it: La informo che abbiamo dato da bere e da mangiare

translation.en: to the rest of your battalion this morning.
translation.it: anche al resto del suo battaglione, stamattina.

translation.en: It looks like your family has grown.
translation.it: A quanto pare, la sua famiglia è cresciuta.

translation.en: They must eat while we talk, unless you are hungry, too.
translation.it: Mangeranno mentre parliamo. A meno che non abbia fame anche lei.

translation.en: I'm not hungry. Two-I-C, take them and go and eat.
translation.it: Non ho fame. Two-I-C, portali a mangiare.

translation.en: [Preacher] Lot of food over here. Let's eat, man!
translation.it: C'è un sacco di roba da mangiare. Approfittiamone, amico.

translation.en: You are leading me to believe we are changing objectives.
translation.it: Mi viene da pensare che gli obiettivi siano cambiati.

translation.en: Are we not taking the capital anymore?
Chief, to protect our people, the time is now.
translation.it: Capo, se vogliamo difendere il nostro popolo, questo è il momento.

translation.en: If we have the momentum and we have the power, why wait?
translation.it: Abbiamo tutto a nostro favore e abbiamo il potere. Perché aspettare?

translation.en: You are not the political voice of this movement, Commandant. I am.
translation.it: Non è lei la voce politica di questo movimento. Sono io.

translation.en: Protecting our people remains the priority.
translation.it: Proteggere il nostro popolo resta la nostra priorità.

translation.en: But as you know, the world is becoming aware of this war now.
translation.it: Ma come si sarà reso conto, il mondo ormai sa di questa guerra.

translation.en: No one will escape judgment when it is over.
translation.it: Quando sarà finita, nessuno sfuggirà al giudizio.

translation.en: And the decisions we make have far deeper consequences.
translation.it: Le decisioni che prendiamo avranno conseguenze più profonde.

translation.en: And what decisions have you made... for my battalion?
translation.it: E quali decisioni ha preso per il mio battaglione?

translation.en: Are you not making me general?
I'm giving your battalion to Two-I-C, Commandant.
translation.it: Darò il suo battaglione a Two-I-C, Comandante.

translation.en: That is why I brought you here.
And you, I will promote to Deputy Chief of Security,
translation.it: Lei sarà promosso a Vice-Capo della Sicurezza

translation.en: I hope you accept and act accordingly.
translation.it: Spero voglia accettare e agire di conseguenza.

translation.en: Thank you, sir. I promise to fulfill my duty to the fullest--
translation.it: Grazie, signore. Adempirò al mio dovere...

translation.en: This, my battalion... that I have made with my own hands.
translation.it: Ho costruito questo battaglione con le mie mani.

translation.en: Your battalion is my battalion, Commandant,
translation.it: Il suo battaglione è mio, Comandante,

translation.en: as are hundreds of others across this nation.
translation.it: come le altre centinaia in tutta la nazione.

translation.en: I want the ceremony of changeover tomorrow,
translation.it: La cerimonia di avvicendamento si terrà domani,

translation.en: so that Two-I-C can take the battalion back out for battle.
translation.it: così Two-I-C potrà riportare subito il battaglione sul campo.

translation.en: As you know, and with thanks to you, we have the NRC on their heels
translation.it: Grazie anche a voi, l'NRC è in fuga,

translation.en: with the help and support of the UN and ECOMOD.
translation.it: con l'aiuto e il sostegno dell'ONU e dell'ECOMOD.

translation.en: It has now become a battle for public image.
translation.it: È diventata una guerra di immagine.

translation.en: And what of my payment? Hmm?
translation.it: E quale sarà la mia ricompensa?

translation.en: What share of the resources will I be seeing?
translation.it: Quale porzione di risorse mi verrà data?

translation.en: Do not forget you are a soldier.
translation.it: Si ricordi che è un soldato.

translation.en: Your most important duty is obedience.

translation.it: Obbedire è il suo primo dovere.

translation.en: Your third duty is obedience. Everything is obedience.
translation.it: E il terzo. Lei deve solo obbedire.

translation.en: I will have one more night... with my men.
translation.it: Passerò un'ultima notte coi miei uomini.

translation.en: Assemble the COs and the troops and bivouac outside of town.
translation.it: Raduna gli ufficiali e i soldati. Andiamo a bivaccare fuori città.

translation.en: I'm taking Two-I-C and the boys to all celebrate tonight.
translation.it: Porto Two-I-C e i ragazzi a festeggiare, stasera.

translation.en: And if you and Strika are my bodyguards, and I am going, then you are also going.
translation.it: Tu e Strika sarete le guardie del corpo. Dove vado io, andrete anche voi.

translation.en: [Commandant] Yeah, make 'em bring something for my soldiers.
translation.it: Porta qualcosa per i miei soldatini.

translation.en: [Madam] Okay. [Commandant] And my own soldier. [Madam] Hey, hey...
translation.it: - Ok. - E per il mio soldato.

translation.en: Bring beer. Bring soda. Bring whatever you have.
translation.it: Birra. Bibite. Quello che ti pare.

translation.en: Can't you see we have guests? Hurry!
translation.it: Non vedi che abbiamo ospiti? Presto!
Come mai la birra è calda?

translation.en: because we will drink it whether it's hot or it's cold.
translation.it: perché la berremo comunque, calda o fredda.
Comandante, chiedo il permesso di congedarmi.

translation.en: I need to be checking on the others--
You will be staying here so we can celebrate you.
translation.it: Resterai qui a festeggiare la tua promozione.

translation.en: In fact, Mama, I want you to bring a special one for my Two-I-C,
translation.it: Anzi, bella, porta qualcosa di speciale a Two-I-C,

translation.en: who will soon be the Commandant.

translation.it: - Chi è il vostro Comandante? - Lei, signore.

translation.en: [Commandant] Hmm. But you have one special for Two-I-C.
translation.it: Ma voglio una ragazza speciale per Two-I-C.

translation.en: Hey, Mama, this one has fresh papaya.
translation.it: Ehi, bella, questa ha una bella papaia.

translation.en: If it is women you wanting, I get plenty from backyard.
translation.it: Se cerchi le donne, ne ho quante ne vuoi.

translation.en: Just bring me my own. You know my specifications.
translation.it: Portami la mia. Sai chi mi piace.

translation.en: See this little yeah-yeah boy born yesterday.
translation.it: Ma senti questo ragazzino nato ieri.

translation.en: [Commandant] Don't mind him. Don't mind him.
-Where are the girls? -[Madam] They are coming.
translation.it: - Dove sono le ragazze? - Stanno arrivando.

translation.en: We've got enough girls for the men, but no more for the little boys.
translation.it: Abbiamo donne per gli uomini, ma non per i ragazzini.

translation.en: Look at you. Look at you.
[Commandant] You are looking very hot. [woman] Yeah, I miss you.
translation.it: - Sei molto sexy. - Mi sei mancato.

translation.en: -[Commandant] Oh, you miss me. Really? -[Commandant] Oh, you miss me. Really? -Mmm-hmm.
Don't be watching your Commandant because you can't have what I'm having.
translation.it: Non guardate il Comandante, questa non è roba per voi.

translation.en: What happened to my man? What happened here?
translation.it: Cos'è successo al mio soldato? Chi è stato?

translation.en: I was just playing with his gun and it just went off.
translation.it: Giocavo con la pistola ed è partito un colpo.

translation.en: -I don't know what happened. I'm sorry.
-I don't know what happened. I'm sorry. -[Two-I-C] You did this.
translation.it: - Non so come. Mi dispiace. - È stato lei.
- È stato lei. - È stato lei. - Calma!

translation.en: You did this! You did this!
-You thought you were shooting me! -No, no, no!
-You thought it was me? -I didn't mean to. I'm so sorry.
translation.it: - Credevi fossi io? - Non volevo. Scusa.

translation.en: Were you trying to kill me and you kill my soldier?
translation.it: Volevi uccidere me e uccidi il mio soldato?

translation.en: It was an accident! No! Not me--
translation.it: È stato un incidente! No! Io non...

translation.en: Pick him up! Pick him up! Let's go! Let's go! Let's go!
Pick him up! I want you to take all their women!
translation.it: Tiratelo su! Prendete tutte le donne!

translation.en: -[Preacher] Move! Move! Move! Move! -All of them!
[Preacher] Move! [Commandant] Let's go! Let's go! Move!
[man 1 on radio] All call signs, all call signs, anyone have eyes on Iron Jacket?
translation.it: A tutti i nomi in codice: qualcuno ha visto Iron Jacket?

translation.en: All call signs report visual of Iron Jacket. Over.
translation.it: A tutti i nomi in codice: notizie di Iron Jacket? Passo.

translation.en: [man 2 on radio] Mountain View, Z Fire. Did not copy. Over.
translation.it: Mountain View, Z Fire. Non ricevuto. Passo.

translation.en: [man 1] All call signs, report visual on Iron Jacket.
translation.it: Ripeto, a tutti i nomi in codice: notizie di Iron Jacket?

translation.en: Any knowledge on the location or movement of Iron Jacket? Over.
translation.it: Potete fornire posizione e movimenti di Iron Jacket? Passo.

translation.en: I repeat, no visual of Iron Jacket. Over.
translation.it: Ripeto: nessun avvistamento di Iron Jacket. Passo.

translation.en: [man 3 on radio] Mountain View. Two-two. Copy same. No visual on Iron Jacket.
translation.it: Mountain View. Due-due. Ricevuto. Nessun avvistamento di Iron Jacket.

translation.en: [man 4 on radio] Mountain View. Black Sand.
Report, Iron Jacket moved out from our checkpoint yesterday. Over.
translation.it: Iron Jacket ha lasciato ieri il nostro checkpoint. Passo.
Black Sand. Mountain View. Iron Jacket ha attraversato il vostro settore? Passo.

translation.en: Iron Jacket moved through your sector? Over.
translation.it: Iron Jacket ha attraversato il vostro settore? Passo.

translation.en: [man 4 on radio] Mountain View, Black Sand, Roger.
Iron Jacket battalion moved out with orders for battle. Over.
translation.it: Il battaglione Iron Jack è partito con ordine di attaccare. Passo.
Tutto questo non è servito a niente.

translation.en: [man 1] Iron Jacket, this is Mountain View.
-Come and sit with me. -[man 1] Iron Jacket, do you copy? Over.
translation.it: - Vieni a sederti qui con me. - Iron Jacket, mi sentite? Passo.

translation.en: Iron Jacket, you are disobeying a direct--
translation.it: Iron Jacket, state disobbedendo a un ordine diretto...

translation.en: Agu, these are very dangerous times.
translation.it: Agu, questi sono tempi molto pericolosi.

translation.en: Never know who you could be trusting.
translation.it: Non si può mai sapere di chi fidarsi.

translation.en: That is why it is good to always sleep one eye open.
translation.it: Ecco perché bisogna sempre dormire con un occhio aperto.

translation.en: That is why I have you and I have Strika.
translation.it: Ed ecco perché io ho te e Strika.

translation.en: Agu, sometimes I'm feeling sorry for you.
translation.it: Agu, a volte mi dispiace per te.

translation.en: [soldiers] ♪ God, bless the man who died ♪
♪ For the sake of the NDF ♪
♪ God, bless the man who died ♪
Our Father, today we lost our fellow soldier.
translation.it: Padre Nostro, oggi abbiamo perso un nostro soldato.

translation.en: Guide him forever and ever. Amen.

translation.it: Questa non è opera di Dio.
Il Comandante Supremo era nostro amico.

translation.en: But we are not fearing change, for we are strong!
translation.it: Ma il cambiamento non ci spaventa, perché siamo forti!

translation.en: That is why we should be taking our own territory...
translation.it: Quindi dovremo conquistarci un nostro territorio
e riempirci le tasche da soli.

translation.en: [Agu] We are leaving Two-I-C to be eaten by gogomi and worms.
translation.it: Lasceremo Two-I-C in pasto ai gogomi e ai vermi.

translation.en: "The only way not to be fighting anymore is to be dying."
translation.it: "L'unico modo per non combattere più è morire".
Un medico! Dove cazzo è il medico?

translation.en: [Agu] People are dying just like this every day.
translation.it: Ogni giorno c'è gente che muore così.

translation.en: Every person I am knowing is dying.
"If this war is ever ending, I cannot be going back to doing child things."
translation.it: "Se mai questa guerra finirà, non potrò tornare il bambino che ero".

translation.en: Just making person to bleed everywhere.
We are just like wild animals now with no place to be going.
translation.it: Ormai siamo animali selvaggi, senza un posto dove andare.

translation.en: why are you shining on this world?
I am wanting to catch you in my hands,
translation.it: Vorrei prenderti con le mie mani

translation.en: to squeeze you until you cannot shine no more.
translation.it: e schiacciarti, per non farti splendere più.

translation.en: That way, everything is always dark
and nobody's ever having to see
all the terrible things that are happening here.
translation.it: tutte le cose terribili che succedono qui.

translation.en: Stand up and let's go! We are going.
I am wanting to say to Strika, "I am tired, too."
translation.it: Vorrei dire a Strika: "Sono stanco anch'io".

translation.en: and so the words are not coming out of my mouth.
translation.it: che le parole non riescono a uscire dalla mia bocca.

translation.en: A song, just like my mother sang.
translation.it: Una canzone, come quelle che cantava mia madre.

translation.en: Go get me some fucking bullets to be shooting right now. Move!
translation.it: Vai a prendermi delle munizioni. Sbrigati!

translation.en: I can only be talking to you now because God is not listening.
translation.it: Ormai posso solo parlare con te, perché Dio non mi ascolta.

translation.en: Your song is making my body to move,
translation.it: Il tuo canto mi dà la forza di muovermi

translation.en: and I am not having to think anymore.
Not about Strika, not about this war,
translation.it: Non penso a Strika, a questa guerra

translation.en: not about any of the things that are jumping into my head.
translation.it: o alle altre cose che mi tormentano la mente.

translation.en: I am wanting to lie down on the warm ground
translation.it: Vorrei solo distendermi sulla terra calda,

translation.en: with my eyes closed and the smell of mud in my nose.
translation.it: con gli occhi chiusi e l'odore di fango nel naso.

translation.en: It wasn't supposed to be the way that it has turned out to be.
translation.it: Non era così che doveva andare.

translation.en: But you, I will always protect you, Agu, because you are my son...
translation.it: Ma ti proteggerò sempre, Agu, perché per me sei un figlio.

translation.en: and a son always protects a father.
translation.it: E un figlio protegge sempre il padre.

translation.en: Commandant, I want to talk to you, sir.

translation.it: Chi è che se ne va?

translation.en: Two-I-C, go back to your post.
No, sir. We are going, sir.
You are the only one standing in front of me, stupid.
translation.it: Ci sei solo tu di fronte a me, stupido.

translation.en: I am going, sir. No bullets. What am I going to use to shoot my enemy?
translation.it: Me ne vado, signore. Senza munizioni, con cosa spariamo al nemico?

translation.en: We have been here for months now.
No money, no food, no water.
translation.it: Niente soldi, niente cibo, niente acqua.

translation.en: People sick here and dying every day.
translation.it: Ogni giorno qui qualcuno si ammala e muore.

translation.en: Who want to stay here and die?
translation.it: Chi vuole restare qui a morire?

translation.en: [soldier 1] I want to go! [soldier 2] I want to going!
Who want to stay here and die?
translation.it: Chi vuole restare qui a morire?

translation.en: Me, too. I want to go, sir!
[Preacher] Who want to stay here and die?
translation.it: Chi vuole restare qui a morire?

translation.en: -Nobody want to stay here, sir! -We want to go, sir.
translation.it: - Nessuno vuole restare, signore! - Vogliamo andare via.

translation.en: Then come and tell him how you feel.
translation.it: Allora venite a dirlo a lui.

translation.en: Come and tell him how much we are suffering here.
translation.it: Venite a dirgli quanto stiamo male.

translation.en: So, you... you are the big man now, huh?
Where will you be going? Huh?
Will you surrender to the other NDF camp?
translation.it: Vi arrenderete in un altro campo NDF?
O forse in un campo dell'ECOMOD?

translation.en: That might be better, but what next?
You think you can just go and do what you want in peace?
translation.it: Credete di poter fare quello che volete in pace?

translation.en: You will go back to your village
and your family will not associate themselves with you.
translation.it: e la vostra famiglia non vi riconoscerà nemmeno.

translation.en: You and your uneducated, poor mind, you'll be nothing.
translation.it: Voi e il vostro cervello ignorante non varrete niente.

translation.en: Nobody will care for you. Huh?
And you will wake up and you will rise and see the sunrise and see the sunset,
translation.it: Vi sveglierete, vedrete il sole sorgere e tramontare

translation.en: and you can just wait all day, all day,
with thousands of men just like you, waiting for somebody to give you a job.
translation.it: insieme a migliaia di uomini come voi, che qualcuno vi dia un lavoro.

translation.en: That is what you want to go and do?
translation.it: È questo ciò che volete fare?
Non avete niente! Non avete futuro!

translation.en: How are you going to shoot me if you don't have bullets?
translation.it: Come fai a spararmi, senza munizioni?

translation.en: Hey, Agu, I want you to kill Commandant. Come.
translation.it: Avanti, Agu. Uccidi il Comandante. Coraggio.

translation.en: Come, Agu, come. Put it here. Here!
translation.it: Avanti, Agu. Appoggia la canna qui!

translation.en: Just remember, when you are all poor and hungry
translation.it: Quando sarete tutti poveri e affamati,

translation.en: [soldier] Yes, sir! [Preacher] Come on, let's go.
And know that I will be calling for you one day.
translation.it: Sappiate che un giorno sentirete il mio richiamo.

translation.en: Go and drink gunpowder tea and playing draughts.
translation.it: Andate a bere tè verde e a giocare a dama.

translation.en: No, no, no. You remember me. You remember your Commandant.
translation.it: No. Vi ricorderete di me, del vostro Comandante.

translation.en: Remember, I will call for you again...
translation.it: Ricordati: un giorno sentirai di nuovo il mio richiamo

translation.en: They will just lock you up in jail! You are stupid!
translation.it: Vi sbatteranno in galera! Siete stupidi!

translation.en: the other ones, they'll come eat you.
translation.it: in cui gli altri vi divoreranno.

translation.en: Just chop for you... [stammering] your heart.
Agu, you stay here because they don't...
translation.it: Agu, tu resta qui, perché loro non...

translation.en: [soldier] And what is your mission here?
Raise up your arms! All weapons in the air!
translation.it: Mani in alto! Armi sopra la testa!

translation.en: Now turn and face the bush!
Don't look at my face! Put your weapons on the ground!
translation.it: Non guardatemi! Posate le armi a terra!

translation.en: Hands up! Sit on the floor!
Put your hands on your head!
[Father Friday] Agu, how are you settling in?
We are all here to help you.
[Agu] I am not knowing how long I am staying here...
translation.it: Non so da quanto tempo sono qui,

translation.en: but I'm staying here for a long time.
Some week, some month, I am not knowing.
All I am knowing is how it is feeling here.
I am knowing the sound of people screaming and the smell of dead bodies...
translation.it: Sento ancora le urla assordanti, l'odore dei cadaveri

translation.en: and I am knowing the feeling of the brown-brown and djamba in my blood.
translation.it: e l'effetto della brown-brown e della djamba nel sangue...

translation.en: No, they are giving us poison there!
-They want us to die! -[Father Friday] Calm!
translation.it: - Vogliono farci morire! - Vogliono farci morire! - Calma!

translation.en: [Agu] Preacher is tiring of this place.
translation.it: Predicatore è stanco di questo posto.

translation.en: He's saying, "The war is not over,
and they are needing fighters like us."
We need money for here. We need money. Eh?
You can't stay here without money.
translation.it: Non possiamo stare qui senza soldi.
e combattere è ciò che sappiamo fare.

translation.en: Have you forgotten? We have food to eat.
translation.it: Hai dimenticato tutto? Qui abbiamo da mangiare.

translation.en: You NRC soldier, with the talk, you talk too much.
Agu, I can't stay here. I'm leaving.
translation.it: Agu, non posso restare qui. Me ne vado.

translation.en: Randy, don't go into the bush again.
I don't like when you look into my eyes.
translation.it: Non mi piace quando mi guardi negli occhi.

translation.en: So if I look at a table, how can I talk to you?
translation.it: Se guardo il tavolo, come faccio a parlare con te?

translation.en: She thinks that my no speaking
translation.it: È convinta che io non parli

translation.en: is because I can't be explaining myself like baby,
translation.it: perché non so esprimermi, come i bambini.

translation.en: but I am not like baby.
translation.it: Ma io non sono un bambino.

translation.en: I am like old man and she's like small girl
translation.it: Sono un vecchio. La bambina è lei.

translation.en: because I am fighting in war and she's not even knowing what war is.
translation.it: Io ho combattuto in guerra e lei non sa neanche cosa sia.

translation.en: Try to talk to me about some of your experiences...
translation.it: Prova a parlarmi delle tue esperienze...

translation.en: or try to tell me what you are thinking.
translation.it: ...oppure prova a dirmi cosa stai pensando.

translation.en: So how do you see your future?
translation.it: E come vedi il tuo futuro?

translation.en: I think if you talk to me about it, it will make you feel better.
translation.it: Se riesci a parlarmene, vedrai che ti sentirai meglio.

translation.en: So if I'm talking to you,
it will make me sad... and it will make you, too, sad.
translation.it: diventerei triste e diventeresti triste anche tu.

translation.en: I just want to be happy in this life.
translation.it: Vorrei solo essere felice in questa vita.

translation.en: If I'm telling this to you...
translation.it: Se ti parlassi di quelle cose...

translation.en: I am some sort of beast...
I am all of these things...

translation.it: ...un fratello e una sorella, una volta.
